name: UpdateMessageTemplate
auth_description: Requires a user of type `Employee` or `Api` with functionality `MessageTemplates:Edit`

headers.name: EVA-User-Agent
headers.description: The user agent that is making these calls. Don't make this specific per device/browser but per application. This should be of the form: `MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0`

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnitID
headers.description: The ID of the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-Requested-OrganizationUnit-Query
headers.description: The query that selects the organization unit to run this request in.

headers.name: EVA-IDs-Mode
headers.description: The IDs mode to run this request in. Currently only `ExternalIDs` is supported.

request_samples.name: CURL
request_samples.sample:
curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "EVA-User-Agent: MyFirstUserAgent/1.0.0" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer <token>" \
  --data '{
  "CountryID": "st",
  "Destination": 32,
  "Footer": "string",
  "Header": "string",
  "Helpers": "string",
  "ID": 123,
  "IsDisabled": true,
  "LanguageID": "string",
  "Layout": "string",
  "Name": "string",
  "OrganizationUnitID": 123,
  "PaperProperties": {
    "Format": 9,
    "Margin": {
      "Bottom": 123,
      "Left": 123,
      "Right": 123,
      "Top": 123
    },
    "Orientation": 2,
    "Size": {
      "DeviceScaleFactor": 123.456,
      "Height": "string",
      "Width": "string"
    },
    "ThermalPrinterTemplateType": 1,
    "WaitForJS": true,
    "WaitForNetworkIdle": true
  },
  "Template": "string"
}' \
  https://euw.acme.test.eva-online.cloud/message/UpdateMessageTemplate

C.name: Format
C.description:
Possible values:

* `1` - A3
* `2` - A4
* `3` - A5
* `4` - Legal
* `5` - Letter
* `6` - Tabloid
* `7` - Auto
* `8` - Ledger
* `9` - A0
* `10` - A1
* `11` - A2
* `12` - A6

B.name: CountryID
B.description:
This is the ID of a `Country`

This string must be between 2 (incl) and 2 (incl) characters long.

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: Destination
B.description:
Flags enum, combine any of the below values:

* `1` - Mail
* `2` - Sms
* `4` - Pdf
* `8` - Thermal
* `16` - Notification
* `32` - Http

B.name: Footer
B.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: Header
B.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: Helpers
B.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: ID
B.description: This is the ID of a `MessageTemplate`

B.name: LanguageID
B.description:
This is the ID of a `Language`

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: Layout
B.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: Name
B.description: While this property is not required, if it is sent in the request it must have a valid value.

B.name: OrganizationUnitID
B.description:
This is the ID of a `OrganizationUnit`

Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: PaperProperties
B.description: Providing a `null` value and not providing the property at all has different meanings.

B.name: Template
B.description: While this property is not required, if it is sent in the request it must have a valid value.

G.name: Code
G.description: A unique ID identifying this error.

G.name: Message
G.description: A human-readable message describing the error.

G.name: RequestID
G.description: A unique ID identifying the request. Please provide this ID when contacting support.

G.name: Type
G.description: A short description of the error type.

H.name: ExternalIDs
H.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the resolved external IDs.

H.name: IsAsyncResultAvailable
H.description: This is a flag indicating whether the async request is done. If it is `null`, it is not an async service. If it is `false`, the response is not yet available. Do not process the properties in that case. It is is `true` the properties are filled with the result of the call.

H.name: UnresolvedExternalIDs
H.description: When using the `ExternalIDs` mode, this will hold the external IDs we couldn't resolve.
